channel.title: Chris Brown on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Chris Brown on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sherri Shepherd Would “Love” Chris Brown to Appear on Her Talk Show Despite Potential for “a Lot of Backlash”
item.description: The ‘Sherri’ host reflected on interviewing Jonathan Majors on her show, while revealing she’d also like to sit down with the singer who has faced a series of allegations over the years.
